<h3 id="X31837">X(31837) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd EXTOUCH AND JOHNSON</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^3-(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2)*(-a^2+b^2+c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31837) = 5*X(3)-3*X(10167) = X(4)-5*X(3876) = 3*X(5)-2*X(5806) = X(40)+3*X(5692) = X(65)-3*X(26446) = 5*X(72)+3*X(10167) = 2*X(72)+X(13369) = 3*X(165)+X(5693) = 3*X(210)-X(355) = 3*X(210)+X(14110) = 3*X(376)+X(12528) = X(382)-3*X(5927) = X(946)-3*X(10176) = 7*X(960)-2*X(26200) = 3*X(3740)-X(7686) = 3*X(3740)-2*X(9956) = 3*X(5044)-X(5806) = 3*X(5692)-X(5887) = 6*X(10167)-5*X(13369) = X(31793)+2*X(31835)</b>
<p>X(31837) lies on these lines:

<p>
X(31837) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 72}, {10, 31806}, {40, 5887}, {355, 14110}, {3579, 5694}, {3654, 31165}, {3878, 11362}, {4067, 5884}, {5777, 31793}, {7957, 12699}, {10693, 12778}, {12245, 23340}, {12672, 12702}, {14872, 18481}, {15644, 29958}, {17781, 28458}, {31728, 31817}, {31730, 31803}, {31737, 31825}<br>
X(31837) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 31838), (5, 5044), (942, 140), (3874, 13373), (5777, 31835), (7686, 9956), (9943, 31663), (10391, 7508), (11573, 5447), (12109, 11695), (12675, 13624), (13369, 3), (24475, 9940)<br>
X(31837) = complement of X(24474)<br>
X(31837) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 3927, 24467), (4855, 21165, 3)<br>
